description.value:
Level 1 Divination

Casting Time: 1 bonus

Range: 90 feet

Components: V

Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

You magically mark one creature you can see within range as your quarry. Until the spell ends, you deal an extra 1d6 Force damage to the target whenever you hit it with an attack roll. You also have Advantage|XPHB on any Wisdom (Perception|XPHB or Survival|XPHB) check you make to find it. If the target drops to 0 Hit Points|XPHB before this spell ends, you can take a Bonus Action|XPHB to move the mark to a new creature you can see within range.

At Higher Levels: Your Concentration|XPHB can last longer with a spell slot of level 3-4 (up to 8 hours) or 5+ (up to 24 hours).
